fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars

Class DerivableValue<Type extends java.lang.Number>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars.Value<Type>
      • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.vars.DerivableValue<Type>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TimedValueI

    public class DerivableValue<Type extends java.lang.Number>
extends Value<Type>
    The class DerivableValue augments the superclass Value with the first derivative of the signal is known.

    Description

    Derivable values must be of a suitable type, most commonly a real number.

    Glass-box Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Black-box Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2021-12-07

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

      the first derivative at the given time, if known.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DerivableValue(AtomicHIOA owner)
      create a value instance for the given derivable variable and the given owner with an initial value but without history.
      DerivableValue(AtomicHIOA owner, Duration historyWindow, ValueHistoryFactoryI<Type> valueHistoryFactory)
      create a value instance for the given derivable variable and the given owner with an initial value computed at the given initial time and with the given history size.
      DerivableValue(AtomicHIOA owner, VariableDescriptor descriptor, Duration historyWindow, ValueHistoryFactoryI<Type> valueHistoryFactory)
      create a value instance for the given variable and the given owner and the given variable descriptor with an initial value computed at the given initial time and with the given history size.

        public DerivableValue(AtomicHIOA owner,
                      Duration historyWindow,
                      ValueHistoryFactoryI<Type> valueHistoryFactory)

        Contract

         pre     true        // no more precondition.
 post    true        // no more postcondition.
        Parameters:
        owner - model owning the variable.
        historyWindow - time window governing the size of the history.
        valueHistoryFactory - factory to create an history of the values.

        public void setNewValue(Type v,
                        Time t)
        Description copied from class: Value
        set a new value for this Value object; safer but less efficient to use than modifying the variables v and time directly; mandatory when using a value history.

        Contract

         pre     isInitialised()
 pre     t != null && t.getTimeUnit().equals(getTimeUnit())
 pre     getTime() != null && t.greaterThanOrEqual(getTime())

 post    getTime().equals(t)

      • setNewValue

        public void setNewValue(Type v,
                        Type d,
                        Time t)
        set a new value and derivative for this DerivableValue object; safer but less efficient to use than modifying the variables v and time directly; mandatory when using a value history.

        Contract

         pre     t != null && t.getTimeUnit().equals(timeUnit)
 pre     t.greaterThanOrEqual(time)
 post    true        // no more postcondition.
        Parameters:
        v - new value to be set.
        d - new first derivative to be set.
        t - time at which the new value corresponds.
